overview: In this campy send-up of the James Bond flicks, evil Blofelch Industries plots to rule the world by supplying the antidote for an impotence-causing virus -- which the company unleashed. It's up to Lames Blond (John Wardlaw), aka Agent Double O Zero, and CIA operative Felix Heavier (Bill Garst) to scotch the villainous plan. Along the way, the duo battles the malevolent Mr. Cowabunga and seductress Sherly Bilt (Suzannah LeGault).
title: You Only Die Once
